name: Mondelez International, Inc.
description: Mondelez International, Inc. is a global leader in the snack industry, dedicated to providing consumers with delicious and convenient snack choices. Founded in 2012 as a spinoff from Kraft Foods, Mondelez operates in more than 150 countries and boasts a diverse portfolio of well-known brands. The company specializes in biscuits, chocolate, gum, candy, and powdered beverages, with iconic products such as Oreo, Cadbury, Toblerone, Trident, and belVita. Mondelez is committed to sustainability and responsible sourcing, actively working to reduce its environmental impact and improve the livelihoods of farmers in its supply chain. With a focus on innovation, Mondelez invests heavily in research and development to create new flavors and products that cater to evolving consumer preferences. The company's mission is to empower people to snack right, balancing enjoyment with nutrition, while fostering a culture of inclusivity and diversity within its workforce. Through its global presence and robust marketing strategies, Mondelez continues to expand its market share and enhance its brand portfolio, ensuring its status as a key player in the global snack food industry.
